metadata.title: CVE-2018-20552 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Tcpreplay before 4.3.1 has a heap-based buffer over-read in packet2tree intree.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20552` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
